result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy J. Vignieri

records.addlTxt: No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

9:38 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeremy J. Vignieri in court. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Victim rights compliance. DE advises the Court that he no longer plans on retaining an attorney and would like to proceed pro se. Court adjourns to allow the DE to discuss resolution with the State.
DA pretrial conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

09:33 AM
Defendant, Jeremy J. Vignieri, appeared.
Attorney Zachary L Brost appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Kimberly Keel.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:
Victim rights compliance.
Defendant requesting more time to obtain counsel.
Matter set over, bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued Posted.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with:  Jamie H, Kelly F

235PM  Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 09:15 am.  $650 cont'd posted  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  kmk
and witness list filed by the State
